column4: News;Phnom Penh: A Boeung Kak security guard found a snake weighing more than 30 kilograms after it fell out of a tree.------The python was captured at 2:00 am January 11
column6: along R6 road at Boeung Kak
column7: Daun Penh.------According to the security guard at the scene
column9: he was going about his work when he spotted the serpent
column10: which was about 2 and half metres long
column11: coming out of a tree near the road.------After the incident
column12: security took the python to the police station
column13: where it was given to wildlife conservation staff to be released. ------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/765512.html
